CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'CC_Cliente', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'CC_ClientePA'), CONTAINS( Owner.Username, 'cli-integration'), NOT(ISBLANK(AV_EAPGestor__c)), AV_EAPGestor__r.AV_UsuarioAsociado__r.IsActive ), 'ToBeProcess', AV_NumPerso__c )
CustomField.label: Batch Proccess Owners
